transform_def.name: hexi
transform_def.string: let rin = p_in * (pi() / 3.0) r = exp(rin.y) up = vec2(cos(rin.x), sin(rin.x)) * r den_re = -up.x + 1.0 den_im = -up.y num_re = up.x + 1.0 num_im = up.y inv_r2 = 1 / (den_re * den_re + den_im * den_im) * weight in vec2(num_re * den_re + num_im * den_im, num_im * den_re - num_re * den_im) * inv_r2
